bug.author: L3ss-dev
bug.summary: When install python3.9 with pyenv in macOS, something wrong report.
bug.description:
⚠️IMPORTANT⚠️ if you do not fill this out, we will automatically delete your issue. We will not help anyone that cannot fill out this template.
[✅ ] Have you read our Wiki page "Common Issues & Their Solutions"?
Describe the bug I install python3.9 with pyenv, when I try exec ciphey, an error report. Plaintext ⚠️IMPORTANT⚠️ The below code is non-negotiable for "Ciphey didn't decrypt...." problems. If you do not tell us your plaintext, we will not help you. <denchmark-code> ciphey -p ausearch.enable_nested=True -t "GOWOKGFOTRSERRAUVRFFBFCAAWWAWGTWWQGJFMWBTKFTJASFAEZTZWIMDZRYFPZRATMLGFYDROWRBWLXKGQHGQWQXWLKQYCQOMFCUVJFQVFQTUIECCGDKTZVVJEJBG" Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/hostname/.pyenv/versions/3.9.0/bin/ciphey", line 5, in <module> from ciphey.ciphey import main File "/Users/hostname/.pyenv/versions/3.9.0/lib/python3.9/site-packages/ciphey/__init__.py", line 1, in <module> from . import common File "/Users/hostname/.pyenv/versions/3.9.0/lib/python3.9/site-packages/ciphey/common.py", line 5, in <module> import cipheycore File "/Users/hostname/.pyenv/versions/3.9.0/lib/python3.9/site-packages/cipheycore/__init__.py", line 13, in <module> from . import _ciphey_core_py ImportError: dlopen(/Users/hostname/.pyenv/versions/3.9.0/lib/python3.9/site-packages/cipheycore/_ciphey_core_py.so, 2): Library not loaded: /usr/local/opt/python@3.9/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.9/Python Referenced from: /Users/hostname/.pyenv/versions/3.9.0/lib/python3.9/site-packages/cipheycore/_ciphey_core_py.so Reason: image not found </denchmark-code>
Version ⚠️IMPORTANT⚠️ We need this information because different environments will induce different bugs in Ciphey
OS/Distro: macOS Python version: python3.9.0 Ciphey versions: ciphey 5.11.0, cipheycore 0.3.2, cipherdists 0.3.34 Did you use Docker? No
Run Ciphey with and paste the results into <denchmark-link:https://pastebin.com>Pastebin.com</denchmark-link> or a <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/>GitHub Gist</denchmark-link>
Verbose output is the same as the plaintext. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
What input did you use? What flags / arguments did you use?
Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Any other information? Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: I'm closing this issue because as explained on our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/wiki/Common-Issues-&-Their-Solutions>Common Issues & Their Solutions</denchmark-link> page, Ciphey doesn't currently work on MacOS without using Docker.
